inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getContact.

arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the contact or escalation plan.

tags.description: Map of tags to assign to the resource.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getContact.

alias.description: A unique and identifiable alias of the contact or escalation plan.

displayName.description: Full friendly name of the contact or escalation plan.

id.description: The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.

tags.description: Map of tags to assign to the resource.

type.description: The type of contact engaged. A single contact is type `PERSONAL` and an escalation plan is type `ESCALATION`.
